message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but $12,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $6,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $6,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $8,000?
